#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int t,n1,n2;
string s1,s2;
int main () {
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for(int i=1;i<=t;i++){
      cin>>s1>>s2;
      n1=s1.length();
      n2=s2.size();
      if(n1!=n2)
    {
    printf("NO\n");
    }
    else
    {
     sort(s1.begin(),s1.end());
     sort(s2.begin(),s2.end());
     if(s1==s2)
    {
      printf("YES\n");
    }
    else
    printf("NO\n");
    }
    }

 return 0;
}
